item.title: LAB-8 Configure Security Features and DHCP
item.description: Configuration and verification of security features and DHCP in R1 router.

item.title: LAB-9 Configure Multiple Interfaces and Static Routing
item.description: Configuration and verification of multiple interfaces and static routing in R1 and R2 routers.

item.description: Configuration and verification of static routing in R1, R2, and R3 routers.

item.title: LAB-11 Configure Default Routing
item.description: Configuration and verification of default routing in R1, R2, and R3 routers.

item.title: LAB-12 Configure RIPv1
item.description: Configuration and verification of RIPv1 in R1, R2, and R3 routers.

item.title: LAB-13 Configure RIPv2
item.description: Configuration and verification of RIPv2 in R1, R2, and R3 routers.
